name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. William POWELL, Appellee

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson, zappala and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. William POWELL, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The judgment of sentence entered against Appellee on July 19, 1985, by the Court of Common Pleas of Lawrence County is hereby vacated and the matter is ordered remanded for re-sentencing in accordance with Commonwealth v. Church, 513 Pa. 534, 522 A.2d 30 (1987).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: William M. Panella, Dist. Atty., Anthony J. Kosciuszko, Asst. Dist. Atty., New Castle, for appellant.
S. Sanford Kantz, New Castle, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
581 A.2d 1110
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. William POWELL, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Sept. 16, 1986.
Decided Oct. 9, 1987.
William M. Panella, Dist. Atty., Anthony J. Kosciuszko, Asst. Dist. Atty., New Castle, for appellant.
S. Sanford Kantz, New Castle, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson, zappala and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
